SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover all the books of Brandon Sanderson and vote for your favorites.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: The awards that celebrate the creativity and talent of one of the most outstanding authors of the fantasy genre: Brandon Sanderson.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: From the sands of Taldain to the mists of Scadrial, the worlds of the Cosmere come together to recognize and reward the best works that have captured the imagination and hearts of thousands of readers.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: In this first edition, we gather to honor the epic moments, unforgettable characters, and captivating stories that have brought this universe to life. Join us to vote for your favorite books and characters and be part of this unique celebration.
